New Records: Spencer Arrighetti's 47 strikeouts and 19 hits allowed in August put him alongside Kerry Wood as the only rookies in the Modern Era (since 1900) to record at least 47 strikeouts while allowing no more than 19 hits in a calendar month.
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez belted three home runs.
Spencer Arrighetti carried a no-hit bid into the eighth inning.
Jose Altuve stole home plate in the first inning.
Mauricio Dubón made a great catch at the wall to rob Brandon Marsh of a hit.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada highlighted Jose Altuve's steal of home plate as a catalyst for the team's performance.
Yordan Alvarez emphasized the importance of the early spark provided by Altuve's steal.
Spencer Arrighetti expressed his desire to continue pitching and face Bryce Harper again.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros crushed the Phillies, 10-0, to avoid being swept at Citizens Bank Park.
Yordan Alvarez has 28 homers this year and is slashing .352/.448/.656 with nine homers and 19 RBIs since the All-Star break.
